TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpFileCollection extends System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class HttpFileCollection Inherits NameObjectCollectionBase

summary.span: 提供对由客户端上载的文件的访问权限，并组织这些文件。

span.span: Provides access to and organizes files uploaded by a client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 客户端使用包含 HTTP 标头的多部分 MIME 格式对文件进行编码并将其传输到内容正文 `Content-Type` `multipart/form-data` 。Clients encode files and transmit them in the content body using multipart MIME format with an HTTP `Content-Type` header of `multipart/form-data`. ASP.NET 将 (s) 中的编码文件提取到的各个成员中 。ASP.NET extracts the encoded file(s) from the content body into individual members of an . 类的方法和属性 提供对每个文件的内容和属性的访问。Methods and properties of the class provide access to the contents and properties of each file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问 从对象的属性返回的集合 。The following example demonstrates how to access the collection returned from the property of the object. 该 集合由网页上的两个 控件填充。The collection is populated by two controls on the Web page. 文件集合中的项显示在控件中 。Items in the file collection are displayed in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpFileCollection1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpFileCollection1/cs/HttpFileCollectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpFileCollection1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpFileCollection1/vb/HttpFileCollectionVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllKeys As String()
public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ AllKeys { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串数组，该数组包含文件集合中所有成员的键（名称）。

span.span: Gets a string array containing the keys (names) of all members in the file collection.
An array of file names.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将 从客户端传输的名称加载到字符串数组中。The following example loads the names transmitted from a client into a string array. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpFileCollection.AllKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.AllKeys Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpFileCollection.AllKeys Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.AllKeys Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 从指定的数组索引处开始，将文件集合的成员复制到 中。

span.span: Copies members of the file collection to an beginning at the specified index of the array.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例将整个文件集合复制到一个新的 对象。The following example copies the entire file collection into a new object. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpFileCollection.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.CopyTo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpFileCollection.CopyTo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.CopyTo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 从文件集合中返回一个单独的 对象。

span.span: Returns an individual object from a file collection.

summary.span: 重载此属性以允许按名称或数字索引来检索对象。

span.span: This property is overloaded to allow retrieval of objects by either name or numerical index.

summary.span: 从文件集合中返回具有指定数字索引的 对象。

span.span: Returns the object with the specified numerical index from the file collection.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例检索客户端发送的集合中 (index = 0) 的第一个文件对象，并检索对象表示的文件的名称。The following example retrieves the first file object (index = 0) from the collection sent by the client and retrieves the name of the file represented by the object. [!code-csharp[Classic HttpFileCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.Get1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic HttpFileCollection.Get1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HttpFileCollection.Get1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: name

summary.span: 从文件集合中返回具有指定名称的 对象。

span.span: Returns the object with the specified name from the file collection.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例从客户端发送的集合中检索名为 "CustInfo" 的文件对象，并检索该对象所表示的实际文件的名称。The following example retrieves the file object named "CustInfo" from the collection sent by the client and retrieves the name of the actual file represented by the object. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例循环遍历文件集合并在找到名为 "CustInfo" 的文件集合成员时执行操作。The following example loops through the file collection and takes action if a file collection member with the name "CustInfo" is found. span.span: The name to match.

summary.span: 返回与指定名称相匹配的所有文件。

span.span: Returns all files that match the specified name.
The collection of files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会在每次调用时返回一个新的集合实例。This method returns a new collection instance each time it is called. 每个请求应为每个名称调用一次此方法。This method should be called once per name per request.
